subject: Soccer
World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Cristiane scored in the 75th minute to give Brazil a 3-2 victory against Australia on Sunday. Brazil advanced to its first berth in the semifinals of the women’s World Cup.
snippet: Cristiane scored in the 75th minute to give Brazil a 3-2 victory against Australia on Sunday. Brazil advanced to its first berth in the semifinals of the women’s World Cup.
